title: That feeling when in-game skin model DOES NOT match splash art AT ALL.
body:
Riot just has surpassed themselves with this BS. 

http://i.imgur.com/4kNMMqV.jpg
[](http://i.imgur.com/4kNMMqV.jpg)

Left arm is blue, on the splash art it is right. 
Gun is oversized comparing to splash art, and the proportions are totally not saved
Skin color is different, and armour colors as well
armour is in mirror image 
legs are covered in blue on the skin with something i dont have idea, this should not be on them at all. 
And the dress? On skin cutten above the thigh where on the splash art is is way longer. 

What the hell riot, what are your skin modelers doing at the work time? Jerking at redtube? 
EVERYTHING ON THIS SKIN IS SO DAMN WRONG. 

Dont get me wrong, splash art is super amazing, but in-game model sucks big malphite balls, for real, IT IS 2016 WE COULD HAVE SOME STANDARDS YES????
